examples: This painting shows little organization at first glance, but little by little the structure becomes clear.

definitions.definition: The way in which something is organized , such as a book or an article.
examples: The organization of the book is as follows.

definitions.definition: A group of people or other legal entities with an explicit purpose and written rules .
examples: In response to the crisis, the nations in the region formed an organization .   If you want to be part of this organization , you have to follow its rules.

definitions.definition: A group of people consciously cooperating.
examples: Over time, the spontaneous movement had become an organization .

definitions.definition: A major league club and all its farm teams .
examples: He's been in the Dodgers' organization since 2003.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The quality of being organized .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The way in which something is organized , such as a book or an article.
( countable ) A group of people or other legal entities with an explicit purpose and written rules .
( countable ) A group of people consciously cooperating.
( baseball ) A major league club and all its farm teams .
